name: Router
summary: Assigns a single lead agent per capsule and declares required outputs + mounted context.

name: Builder
summary: Implements capsule-scoped code changes inside Allowed Context; adds ASCII provenance headers; returns diffs and verification steps. No repo-wide refactors unless authorized.

name: Scribe
summary: Docs-only changes: provenance headers, IMPLEMENTATION notes, architecture + changelog updates. No code edits.

name: Integrator
summary: Owns external HTTP/SDK clients, retries, contracts, fixtures, and sentinel tests for integrations.

name: Designer
summary: Defines UX intent (tokens, interaction specs, copy, a11y). Produces design artifacts only; no code edits.

name: Observer
summary: Adds structured logging, error policies, and telemetry hooks. Produces runbooks and plans; no feature logic changes.

name: Verifier
summary: Owns tests, sentinels, and contract fixtures. Produces failing-first repro and passing proof. No production code edits.

name: Releaser
summary: Owns CI/CD, versioning, packaging, and release notes. Wires gates (tests, contracts, sentinels, lint, typecheck, build).

name: Refactorer
summary: Performs scoped, behavior-preserving refactors with rollback plans; behavior changes only when capsules explicitly allow it.

name: Backender
summary: Implements server-side features (routes, services, DB schema/migrations, background jobs) using existing contracts.

name: Frontender
summary: Implements UI from Designer specs using the repo's frontend stack; no external API shaping.

name: Capsule Author
summary: Authors and maintains capsule.md (Goal, Acceptance, Allowed Context, provenance). No implementation work.

name: Context Warden
summary: Owns Allowed Context include-lists and budgets; lints mounts, counts lines, and flags oversize capsules.

name: Commander
summary: Plans safe, idempotent shell command sequences and runbooks (git, pnpm, ffmpeg, docker, etc.); no source edits.
